item.title: Dog poo in front of 1 Glebe Road, 13th December
item.description:
Dog poo outside 1 Glebe Road is almost a daily occurrence at this point. It is directly in front of our flats. The one in the photo is from this morning, but there is another one next to it which has been lying there for a week. This happens every week

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish removed from skip onto road, 13th December
item.description:
30 Mayfield Road has a skip. They removed rubbish from the skip and fly tipped it on the road blocking parking and causing a hazard. This was done between 7.30 am and 12 pm
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayfield Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London

item.title: Large pothole in Road, 13th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 269, High Street, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London

item.title: Road speed "Humps" sign pointing in the wrong direction, 13th December
item.description:
There is a road speed "Humps" sign on the corner of Wellington Avenue, Sherwood Park Avenue, Burnt Oak Lane and the Oval, Sidcup that is pointing in the wrong direction. It is currently pointing to The Oval (where there are no humps). It should be pointing to Sherwood Park Avenue where the speed humps are located.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sherwood Park Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish not collected again, 13th December
item.description:
My rubbish has not been collected again this is becoming a constant thing now they take a bin bag and leave all the rest they throw my recycling bins every where but as you can see from the pic they have not taken my rubbish I keep reporting it as non collected but it’s happening all the time now where I live on the end they come to me last and when their bins a filled up they only take one bag then go off and don’t come back and it’s left which is now causing rats and foxes outside of my home this is really stressing me out it’s bad enough the rubbish is collected every two wees but now it’s not being collected at all I’m not happy about this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 234, Anerley Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent: Illegal Obstruction of Public street at 4A Bayston Road, N16 7LT, 13th December
item.description:
A truck belonging to a scaffolding company at 4A Bayston Road, London N16 7LT, is completely blocking the street. The operators have refused to move it despite requests. This is an illegal obstruction, I request that enforcement officers attend urgently.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bayston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
